snippet: What to do with all of that summer squash? Try this classic casserole, with ingredients that are by no means fancy but are high on flavor. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Sam Sifton Times Classic column shares Julia Reed's recipe for summer-squash casserole.
lead_paragraph: What to do with all of that summer squash? Try this classic casserole, with ingredients that are by no means fancy but are high on flavor. (Article plus video.)

headline.print_headline: Plain but Ritzy, All in One
headline.main: Summer-Squash Casserole, Plain but Ritzy, All in One
